page.title: 20TRADE
page.content: Flamstead stores has been open for 100 years although the present owners have only been there for one year. They were looking for a job in a village where they could work for themselves, have there own business. Both the husband and wife work full time in the shop. Their customers come from the village and pop in for stamps or any other requirement. Only older people tend to use it for all of their groceries since prices are higher than in a supermarket. The present owners are trying to improve the shop by knocking down a wall and introducing a more supermarket type of system.
